byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Opens home to pub to raise funds for Czechoslovakia ambulance service
snippet: GREENWICH, Conn., June 1-- Mr. and Mrs. Edgar M. Clark will open their home here on Field Point Drive, Belle Haven, on the afternoon of June 14 for a reception, tea and entertainment in the ......
